column1: Local Foods////I don't eat out much because I'm a pretty good cook and like to eat light
column2: and I find restaurants too heavy. This is one of the ONLY restaurants I eat out because the salads are awesome and the sandwiches too. I always get the garden Sammie because it would take forever to prepare all the vegetables that they pack into the sandwich. I'd have to make hummus
column8: pickle onions etc. I take a friend and split the meal! I've had the other sandwiches too but this is my fave. I'd thought about getting a job there because I have tried countless times to replicate their salads but I don't even come close.
